headline.main: BIG ALLIED ARMIES TRAIN FOR INVASION; Intensive Preparation Under Way From Casablanca to Cairo -- Nazis Bolster 'Fort'

lead_paragraph: ALLIED HEADQUARTERS IN NORTH AFRICA, July 1 -- Intensive training of Allied armies involving hundreds of thousands of combat troops and thousands of tanks, ships and aircraft is taking place in North Africa from Casablanca to Cairo as preparations for invasion of Europe go forward.
abstract: large forces from Casablanca to Cairo reptd being trained for future battles, southern Eur
